options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

properties.name: toolDescription
properties.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a post

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a post

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many posts

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a post

options.name: authorId
options.description: The ID for the author of the object. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: content
options.description: The content for the post

options.name: slug
options.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type

options.name: password
options.description: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt

options.name: status
options.description: A named status for the post

options.name: commentStatus
options.description: Whether or not comments are open on the post

options.name: pingStatus
options.description: If the a message should be send to announce the post

options.name: format
options.description: Whether or not comments are open on the post

options.name: sticky
options.description: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky

options.name: categories
options.description: The terms assigned to the object in the category taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: tags
options.description: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: context

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: after
options.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date

options.name: author
options.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: before
options.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date

options.name: categories
options.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: context
options.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response

options.name: excludedCategories
options.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: excludedTags
options.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: order
options.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending

options.name: orderBy
options.description: Sort collection by object attribute

options.name: search
options.description: Limit results to those matching a string

options.name: status
options.description: The status of the post

options.name: sticky
options.description: Whether to limit the result set to items that are sticky

options.name: tags
options.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: force
options.description: Whether to bypass trash and force deletion
